嘷字的基本解释

嘷
háo
同“??”。

嘷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［háo］
［《廣韻》胡刀切，平豪，匣。］
亦作“嘷1”。亦作“噑1”。亦作“獆1”。“皋2”的被通假字。
(1)吼叫。
(2)通“號”。号哭，哭叫。

嘷字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嘷； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页207第18
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?乎刀切，音豪。【說文】本作嘷，咆也。【廣韻】熊虎聲。【左傳·襄十四年】豺狼所嘷。【戰國策】兕虎嘷之聲若雷霆。　又通作臯。【周禮·春官·大祝】來瞽令臯舞。【註】臯讀爲卒嘷呼之嘷。　又與號同。【莊子·庚桑楚】兒子終日嘷，而嗌不嗄，和之至也。【司馬相如·子虛賦】左烏嘷之雕弓。　又叶胡鉤切，音侯。【楚辭·招隱士】猨狖羣嘯兮虎豹嘷，攀援桂枝兮聊淹留。【說文】譚長說，从犬作獋。【集韻】或作䝥。

[①]［háo］
["Guangyun" razor cut, Pinghao, Xia. ]
Also known as "嘷1". Also known as "Pang 1". Also known as "獆1". "Gao 2" has been passed falsely.
(1) Howling.
(2) Pass "number". Crying, crying.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嘷; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 207 Page 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Almost knife cut, Yinhao. [Said the text] This is a roar and roar. [Guang Yun] The sound of a tiger. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Fourteen Years] The Jackal's. [Warring States Policy] The sound of the tiger is like thunder.　Tong Zuo Gao again. 【Zhou Li·Chun Official·Big Zhu】Let's go to Lingling Gaowu. [Note] Gao is pronounced as pawn yelling.　The same as the number again. [Zhuangzi·Geng Sangchu] The son is screaming all day long, but he doesn’t scream, he is harmonious. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】The carved bow of Zuo Wulong.　You Yehu Gouqi, Yinhou. [Songs of the Chu · Recruiting Hermits] The stalkers roared with tigers and leopards, and they climbed to Guizhi and talked and drowned. [Said the text] Tan Chang said, from a dog to a roe. 【Ji Yun】or as 䝥.
